DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess safety retrieval Bard Recovery® G2® Filter System . The G2 filter FDA-cleared device inferior vena caval interruption patient pulmonary thromboembolism .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective , Multi-center , Single-arm Study Assess Safety Retrieval Recovery G2 Filter .
DOC.criteria: The patient temporary , increase risk pulmonary embolism require caval interruption The patient implant filter IVC superior vena cava ( SVC ) The patient duplicate leftsided IVC The patient know untreatable uncontrollable malignancy The patient severe spinal deformity The patient creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl The patient life expectancy < 6 month
